InteropTopicSubscription.name: InteropTopicSubscription
InteropTopicSubscription.description: Represents a subscription to an interoperability topic.

ChannelIdentifier.description: The identifier of the channel to which notifications are sent, such as an URL or email.

ChannelTypeCodeId.description: The code representing the type of channel used to send notifications for the interoperability topic subscription.

CheckInInterval.description: The maximum interval, in seconds, before a check-in notification is sent to keep the subscription active when no new events occur.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The last date when the interoperability topic subscription is effective.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The first date when the interoperability topic subscription is effective.

InteropTopicId.description: The interoperability topic that's being subscribed to.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic subscription record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic subscription record was last viewed.

MaximumEventCount.description: The maximum number of events that can be bundled in a notification.

Name.description: The name of the interoperability topic subscription.

NotificationTimeout.description: The maximum amount of time, in seconds, to deliver a notifcation for the subscription.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the interoperability topic subscription record.

PayloadContentType.description: Specifies the type of content included in the notification payload.

PayloadFormatType.description: Specifies the format in which the notification payload for the subscription is sent.

Reason.description: The reason for the interoperability topic subscription.

Status.description: The status of the interoperability topic subscription.

SubscribedById.description: The subscriber to the interoperability topic.

SubscriberIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the subscriber.

SubscriberSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the subscriber system.
